definition: color/complexion/looks/variant of 彩[cai3]/variant of 採|采[cai3]
in glowing spirits (idiom); bursting with life/radiating health and vigor
in high spirits (idiom); glowing with health and vigor

sentences.english: No matter what themes, he whole heart to deduce songs in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 無論什麼主題，他都全心去演繹出歌曲的神采。

sentences.english: My lip gloss has the essential oil orange in it which unquestionably lifts my spirits in an instant.
sentences.chinese: 我用的脣彩就內含橘子精油，可以讓我瞬間神采煥發。

sentences.english: Its unique prescription can effectively stimulate the growth of eyelash, as well as further enhance the expressions in our eyes.
sentences.chinese: 設有獨特配方，令睫毛有增長效果，使雙眸更顯神采。

sentences.english: After her first marriage ended, she had her hair cut.
sentences.chinese: 但第一次婚姻結束後，就剪成神采奕奕的短髮。

sentences.english: In promotional photos, the 65-year-old Ford appears fit as ever.
sentences.chinese: 在宣傳照中，65歲的福特依然顯得神采奕奕。

sentences.english: You look great today. What's happened?
sentences.chinese: 你看起來神采飛揚，發生什麼事了？

sentences.english: I just capture the images that speak of vivacity of the people, their moods.
sentences.chinese: 我恰好拍到一些神采奕奕的人們的照片，他們的情緒。

sentences.english: Carrie was now lightened by a touch of this divine afflatus.
sentences.chinese: 神聖的靈感使嘉莉變得神采奕奕。

sentences.english: He was pacing as he talked, his lean clever face electrically alive.
sentences.chinese: 他一面說一面來回走動，聰明的瘦臉上神采煥發。

sentences.english: The long-term usage can make a skin instauration radiant and delicate white, send out the charming countenance.
sentences.chinese: 長期使用可令眼部肌膚恢復晶瑩嫩白，散發迷人神采。

sentences.english: I dropped to 123 pounds, she beams.
sentences.chinese: 我減到了123磅她神采奕奕的說。

sentences.english: Can that time is really in high spirits.
sentences.chinese: 可那個時候，真的是神采飛揚的。

sentences.english: I am very fond of Begonia, like Ling Han solo appearance and character.
sentences.chinese: 我是極喜愛秋海棠的，喜歡它凌寒獨舞的神采和風骨。

sentences.english: When I look in your eyes, I can feel the butterflies.
sentences.chinese: 當我看着你的眼睛，我能看到神采飛揚。

sentences.english: Genuineness exists in inner heart and expresses itself through appearance.
sentences.chinese: 真性存在內心，神采表現在外，這就是自性之真。

sentences.english: She is exuberating in the knowledge of having contributed to victory.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己對勝利有所貢獻而顯得神采奕奕。

definition: in high spirits (idiom); glowing with health and vigor
in glowing spirits (idiom); bursting with life/radiating health and vigor
eyes bright and full of expression
